N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2420.2 - General wage and salary policies

State Regulations

The following general wage and salary policies shall be
applicable, during the emergency period or until such earlier time as the board
shall determine, to collective bargaining agreements of the city or any covered
organization: (a) No agreement shall
provide for general wage or salary increases or increases in costs of fringe
benefits. (b) No agreement shall
provide for increases or adjustments to salaries or wages, including those
based upon increases in the cost of living, unless such increases or
adjustments are funded by independently measured savings realized, without
reduction in services, through gains in productivity, reductions of costs of
fringe benefits or through other savings or other revenues approved by the
board, all of which savings shall be in addition to those provided for in the
financial plan. (c) Each agreement
shall provide for a mechanism to permit savings in pension costs or other costs
of fringe benefits during the term of agreement. Notes
